main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Vandalia, Ohio on 7 Dec 1960, involving an unidentified flying object photographed the previous day.
interesting points: The sighting was documented in a project record card from Project Blue Book., A request for photographic analysis was made on the object allegedly photographed on 6 December 1960., The object was reported to have a bright metallic surface and appeared round in shape., The report notes that the photograph was taken with a 35mm camera with specific exposure settings., The object was visually and photographically observed under good weather conditions.
